TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SectionInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含與組態階層架構內個別區段有關的中繼資料。

span.span: Contains metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 物件包含的個別區段中的組態階層架構的相關中繼資料。The object contains the metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy. 此物件可以用來驗證及變更個別區段的屬性。This object can be used in order to validate and change the properties of an individual section. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得相關聯的中繼資料物件。The following example shows how to get the metadata that is associated with a object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#91](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#91)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#91](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#91)] 下列範例是先前的範例會使用組態檔的摘錄。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that is used by the previous example. ```
```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowLocation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出組態區段是否允許 屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the configuration section allows the attribute.

value.span: 如果允許 屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the attribute is allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`false`、屬性指出原生程式碼讀取者存取 > 一節。When set to `false`, the property indicates that the section is accessed by native-code readers. 因此，使用`location`不允許屬性，因為原生程式碼讀取器不支援的概念`location`。Therefore, the use of the `location` attribute is not allowed, because the native-code readers do not support the concept of `location`. ## Examples 本節中的範例示範如何取得後存取組態檔中的相關的區段資訊的屬性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下列範例會取得物件。The following example gets the object. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定關聯的組態區段定義所在的 Include 檔的名稱 (如果此檔案存在)。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the include file in which the associated configuration section is defined, if such a file exists.

value.span: 關聯的 定義所在的 Include 檔的名稱 (如果此檔案存在)，否則為空字串。

span.span: The name of the include file in which the associated is defined, if such a file exists; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的值`configSource`屬性指定與其相關聯物件物件。The property represents the value of the `configSource` attribute that is specified for a object that is associated with the object. A實作可以選擇性地指定個別的檔案，其中定義該區段的組態設定。A implementation can optionally specify a separate file in which the configuration settings for that section are defined. 這可用於多個方法：This can be useful in multiple ways: - 使用包括檔案可能會導致組態檔的更邏輯且模組化結構。Using include files can result in a more logical and modular structure for configuration files. - 檔案存取安全性和權限可用來限制存取區段的組態設定。File-access security and permissions can be used to restrict access to sections of configuration settings. - 可以修改並重新載入而不需要重新啟動應用程式的 include 檔中不會在應用程式初始化期間使用的設定。Settings in an include file that are not used during application initialization can be modified and reloaded without requiring an application restart. 下列範例顯示如何這個屬性使用組態檔中指定`pages`區段定義在外部的 include 檔：The following example shows how this attribute is used in a configuration file to specify that the `pages` section is defined in an external include file: `` 如果設定中設定的任何包含檔案需要重新啟動它們修改時，應用程式設定屬性`true`。If any of the settings in a configuration include file require the application to restart when they are modified, set the property to `true`. 在 ASP.NET 應用程式，會在執行的階段可以指派給屬性的替代設定檔的名稱。In ASP.NET applications, at run time you can assign to the property the name of an alternative configuration file. 在此情況下，包含在 Web.config 檔案中的預設連接字串資訊會覆寫檔案的內容。In that case, the contents of the file are overwritten by the default connection string information that is contained in the Web.config file. 這也會發生時替代檔案不存在，它會建立在執行階段。This occurs also when the alternative file does not exist and it is created at run time. 如果 Web.config 檔案中沒有任何連接字串資訊，請至替代檔案加入空的區段。If the Web.config file does not contain any connection string information, an empty section is added to the alternative file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfigurationBuilder As ConfigurationBuilder

summary.span: 取得此設定區段的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object for this configuration section.

value.span: 此設定區段的 物件。

span.span: The object for this configuration section.

summary.span: 強制關聯的組態區段出現在組態檔中。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態區段不會寫入組態檔中，當它繼承自父檔案。A configuration section is not written in a configuration file when it is inherited from a parent file. 如果您想要顯示的子系的組態檔中的父區段，您必須設定至`true`。If you want the parent section to show in the child configuration file, you must set the to `true`. 這使組態檔移植從一部電腦之間。This makes a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 這也可讓您確保區段的存在，即使您沒有父組態檔控制。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration() cil managed

summary.span: 強制關聯的組態區段出現在組態檔中。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會強制這寫入組態檔的宣告。The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以強制寫入組態檔，即使部分不需要，因為它已經宣告為父檔案中的宣告。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if the section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以使檔案從一部電腦移植至另一個組態。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 它可讓您確定區段存在即使當您沒有父組態檔控制。It enables you to make sure that the section exists even when you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool force) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool require) cil managed

summary.span: 強制關聯的組態區段出現在組態檔中，或是從組態檔中移除現有的區段。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file, or removes an existing section from the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會強制這寫入至組態檔，如果宣告`force`是`true`。The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file if `force` is `true`. 如果`force`是`false`，可能會忽略這個動作，如果宣告由系統所需。If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the declaration is required by the system. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以強制寫入組態檔，即使此區段不需要，因為它已經宣告為父檔案中的宣告。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if this section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以使檔案從一部電腦移植至另一個組態。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 這也可讓您確保區段的存在，即使您沒有父組態檔控制。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#113)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#113)]

exception.span: 為 ，而且關聯的區段無法匯出至子組態檔，或未宣告。

span.span: is and the associated section cannot be exported to the child configuration file, or it is undeclared.

para.span: 如果儲存組態檔 (即使沒有做任何修改)，ASP.NET 就會重新啟動應用程式。

span.span: If the configuration file is saved (even if there are no modifications), ASP.NET restarts the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool InheritInChildApplications { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出位於相關應用程式子目錄中的應用程式是否會繼承關聯組態區段中指定的設定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the settings that are specified in the associated configuration section are inherited by applications that reside in a subdirectory of the relevant application.

value.span: 如果在此 物件中指定之設定會由子應用程式所繼承，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the settings specified in this object are inherited by child applications; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表`inheritInChildApplications`屬性`location`組態檔中的項目。The property represents the `inheritInChildApplications` attribute of a `location` element in a configuration file. 設定至`false`來防止專至特定位置 （例如網站的根目錄） 子目錄中存在的應用程式由繼承的設定。Set to `false` to prevent settings that are specific to a certain location (such as the root directory of a Web site) from being inherited by applications that exist in subdirectories. 下列範例會示範如何使用組態檔中的這個屬性來指定網站的根位置項目中定義的設定不會繼承子應用程式：The following example shows how to use this attribute in a configuration file to specify that the settings defined in the location element for the root of a Web site should not be inherited by child applications: `` 屬性適用於只為特定位置的組態設定。The property applies only to location-specific configuration settings. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得值物件。The following example shows how to get the value of a object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`相關的區段遭當或屬性。The property returns `true` when the related section is locked by the or the property. 如果無法覆寫或目前的組態檔中定義，鎖定區段。A section is locked if it cannot be overridden or defined in the current configuration file. ## Examples 本節中的範例示範如何取得後存取組態檔中的相關的區段資訊的屬性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下列範例會取得物件。The following example gets the object. span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受保護的組態區段會加密，且為唯讀。Protected configuration sections are encrypted and read-only. 如需受保護的組態區段的詳細資訊，請參閱[加密組態資訊使用受保護的組態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 本節中的範例示範如何取得後存取組態檔中的相關的區段資訊的屬性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下列範例會取得物件。The following example gets the object. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::OverrideMode OverrideMode { System::Configuration::OverrideMode get(); void set(System::Configuration::OverrideMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 列舉值，這個列舉值會指定子組態檔是否可以覆寫關聯的組態區段。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration value that specifies whether the associated configuration section can be overridden by child configuration files.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得或設定值，指出資源是否宣告內`location`元素會覆寫子組態檔。The property gets or sets a value that indicates whether resources declared inside a `location` element can be overridden by child configuration files. 屬性會取得或設定值，這個值指定類似的行為，但會以特定的組態項目或群組，而且會使用其中一個列舉值。The property gets or sets a value that specifies similar behavior, but does so for a specific configuration element or group, and uses one of the enumeration values. 屬性可讓從父元素繼承行為。The property enables behavior to be inherited from a parent element. 您不能以程式設計方式設定兩者和屬性。You cannot programmatically set both the and property. 設定屬性`true`設定屬性。Setting the property to `true` sets the property to . 設定屬性`false`設定屬性`false`。Setting the property to `false` sets the property to `false`.

exception.span: 嘗試同時變更 和 屬性，因相容性原因不支援這種變更方式。

span.span: An attempt was made to change both the and properties, which is not supported for compatibility reasons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態區段的屬性只能設定為或值列舉型別。The property of a configuration section can only be set to the or value of the enumeration. 設定屬性相當於將值設定為。Setting the property to is equivalent to setting the value to .

exception.span: 覆寫行為是在父組態區段中指定。

span.span: The override behavior is specified in a parent configuration section.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string protectionProvider) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string provider) cil managed

summary.span: 標示將保護的組態區段。

span.span: Marks a configuration section for protection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將標記加密區段，如此將會以加密形式中寫入磁碟上。The method marks the section for encryption so it will be written in encrypted form on disk. 根據預設，會包含下列保護提供者：The following protection providers are included by default: > [!NOTE] > 如果您呼叫方法`null`參數或空字串，類別做為保護提供者。If you call the method with a `null` parameter or an empty string, the class is used as the protection provider. 如需受保護的組態區段的詳細資訊，請參閱[加密組態資訊使用受保護的組態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#94)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#94)]

span.span: The property is set to .
\- or -

exception.span: 目標區段已是受保護的資料區段。

span.span: The target section is already a protected data section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequirePermission { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出關聯的組態區段是否需要存取權限。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated configuration section requires access permissions.

value.span: 如果 屬性設定為 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the attribute is set to ; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設`true`、`GetSection`方法會受到應用程式的信任層級設定。When is set to `true`, the `GetSection` methods are restricted by the trust level setting of the application. 這表示方法或屬性可讓您存取組態區段處理常式設定 Web 應用程式的信任層級受到限制。This means that methods or properties that allow access to configuration section handlers are restricted by the trust level set for the Web application. > [!NOTE] > 由於高和完全信任層級，以允許存取目前的應用程式定義域以外的檔案，應用程式可以使用組態區段處理常式只能在這些信任層級。Because high and full trust are the only levels that allow access to files outside the current application domain, an application can use configuration section handlers only at these trust levels. 當設`false`，組態資料的存取不受限於應用程式的信任層級設定。When is set to `false`, the access to the configuration data is not restricted by the application's trust level settings. > [!NOTE] > 適當的檔案 ACL （存取控制清單） 權限是否仍需要，不論設定。The appropriate file ACL (Access Control List) permissions are still required, regardless of the setting. ACL 權限會決定誰可以存取組態檔。ACL permissions determine who can access the configuration file. ## Examples 下列範例顯示 Web 應用程式的兩個可能的信任層級時屬性`appSettings`區段是`true`。The following example shows two possible trust levels for a Web application when the property of the `appSettings` section is `true`. ``` // With the following trust value // the code below works. // With the following trust value // the code below does not work. ``` 下列範例顯示程式碼執行不會發生錯誤時的信任層級設定為 full。The following example shows code that runs without errors when the trust level is set to full. 否則，程式碼會產生錯誤。Otherwise, the code results in an error. ```csharp AppSettingsSection apSection = ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings") as AppSettingsSection; NameValueCollection apSectionCollection = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings; ``` ```vb Dim apSection As AppSettingsSection = _ TryCast(ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings"), AppSettingsSection) Dim apSectionCollection As NameValueCollection = _ ConfigurationManager.AppSettings ```

exception.span: 選取的值與已定義的值發生衝突。

span.span: The selected value conflicts with a value that is already defined.
